entries.name: Age
entries: As long as its body is kept in good repair, there is no known limit to how long it can function.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most Warforged are Lawful Neutral. They tend to respect order and rarely exhibit chaotic tendencies.

entries.name: Size
entries: Warforged are generally broader and heavier than humans ranging between 250 and 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Living Construct
entries: Even though you were constructed, you are a living humanoid (construct). You are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe, but you can ingest food and drink if you wish. Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You are considered unconscious for this duration but you return to consciousness after you take damage, the 4 hour duration ends, or a command phrase you choose is spoken where you could hear if you were conscious. For instance, using the command phrase in a whisper from 5 feet away or a shout from 60 feet away could bring you out of the state.

entries.name: Iron Shell
entries: While you aren't wearing armor, you can calculate your AC as 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit. You are not considered to be wearing armor for this feature.

entries.name: Poison Immunity
entries: You are immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Binary, Common and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Keen Sensors
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

entries.name: Adaptive Plating
entries: You are adapted to Extreme Heat, Extreme Cold, and Frigid Water as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.
